Location , Location , Location We enjoyed a 3 day stay at the Parc 55 !
The location is the best because of the proximity to BART ( across the street )  , and the cable cars ( 1 block away )  .

Westfield Shopping Center is located directly across the street ( Nordstroms , Bloomingdale , great food court too )  . The service and the rooms were excellent and we would highly recommend this hotel to anyone staying in San Francisco that would like to be close to the shopping and public transportation .
